name: Puzzle Knight
description:
The world is in peril and there is only one man left who can save it! Oh hell, it's Sir Morpheus. We're screwed.

PUZZLE KNIGHT is a delightfully addictive and mysterious puzzle-platformer by Foreach Games. Take control of Sir Morpheus, the world’s most dimwitted yet enthusiastic knight, and guide him through a gigantic maze-like forest whilst solving fantastical puzzles and beating the holy snot out of goblins.

Morpheus is the ideal human specimen, he has both a perfectly spherical torso and an empty head. This leaves him in an excellent position to both defend his big boned body against attacks and have one less weak spot to defend, what more could one ask for? Perhaps the rest of world disagrees, but he’s their only hope now. With your guidance, the world will surely be saved. Are you up for the challenge?

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
